00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #include <string.h>
00004 #include <endian.h>
00005 #include <byteswap.h>
00006 #include "midas.h"
00007 
00008 #include "mucap_structures.h"
00009 #include "mucap_compress.h"
00010 
00011 HNDLE hDB;
00012 
00013 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00014 {
00015     char host_name[256], exp_name[32];
00016 
00017     cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), exp_name,
00018                        sizeof(exp_name));
00019     cm_connect_experiment(host_name, exp_name, "mucap_compress", NULL);
00020     cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00021     
00022     compress_load_all();
00023 
00024     if(argc != 3) {
00025       printf("Usage: mucap_compress uncompressed_input.mid compressed_output.mid\n");
00026       exit(1);
00027     }
00028 
00029     FILE *fp = fopen(argv[1], "r");
00030     if (!fp) {
00031       printf("Unable to open %s\n", argv[1]);
00032       exit(1);
00033     }
00034 
00035     FILE *output_fp = fopen(argv[2], "w");
00036     if (!fp) {
00037       printf("Unable to open %s\n", argv[2]);
00038       exit(1);
00039     }
00040 
00041     char *input_event = new char[MAX_EVENT_SIZE];
00042     char *output_event = new char[MAX_EVENT_SIZE];
00043 
00044     while (read_midas_event(fp, input_event) == SUCCESS) {
00045 
00046         EVENT_HEADER header = *((EVENT_HEADER *) input_event);
00047         int event_id = header.event_id;
00048 
00049         if (event_id == EVENTID_BOR || event_id == EVENTID_EOR ||
00050             event_id == EVENTID_MESSAGE) {
00051 
00052            // For non-ordinary events, just write out the raw data
00053            fwrite(input_event, 1, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER) + header.data_size, 
00054                   output_fp);
00055         } else {
00056 
00057           bk_init32(output_event);
00058           compress_event(input_event + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER), output_event);
00059           header.data_size = bk_size(output_event);
00060           
00061           fwrite(&header, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER), 1, output_fp);
00062           fwrite(output_event, 1, header.data_size, output_fp);
00063        }
00064     }
00065 
00066     fclose(fp);
00067     fclose(output_fp);
00068 
00069     cm_disconnect_experiment();
00070 }
